incident_solutions.description: A complete network outage affecting multiple users in a region.

resolution_steps.action: Identify the network nodes affected by the outage.
resolution_steps.details: Using network monitoring tools, pinpoint the location of the outage and check for any common failure points.

resolution_steps.action: Check for power failure or hardware issues.
resolution_steps.details: Ensure that all network equipment is properly powered and not showing hardware failures.
Reboot routers, switches, and any intermediate devices to clear any temporary errors.
After rebooting devices, test the connectivity to ensure the issue is resolved.

questionnaire.question: Are all network devices powered on and functioning properly?
Have there been any recent firmware updates or configuration changes?

incident_solutions.description: The database is down, causing issues with data retrieval and transactions.

resolution_steps.action: Verify if the database service is running.
resolution_steps.details: Check the status of the database service and restart it if necessary.

resolution_steps.action: Check for any recent database updates or migrations.
resolution_steps.details: Ensure that no recent changes or migrations have caused the downtime.
Look for any error messages in the database logs that could point to the root cause of the downtime.
If the issue cannot be resolved, restore the database from the latest backup to minimize downtime.

questionnaire.question: Is the database service running and responsive?
Were there any recent changes made to the database (e.g., updates, migrations)?

incident_solutions.description: Unauthorized access to critical systems or data.

resolution_steps.action: Identify the source of the breach.
resolution_steps.details: Check security logs to trace the unauthorized access and pinpoint the breach's origin.
Isolate affected systems to prevent further damage or unauthorized access.
Change passwords, implement multi-factor authentication, and ensure firewall rules are updated.
Use intrusion detection systems to continuously monitor for further suspicious activity.

questionnaire.question: Was unauthorized access detected in any system?
Has multi-factor authentication been enabled on critical systems?

incident_solutions.description: A critical system failure preventing operations.

resolution_steps.details: Use system monitoring tools to determine which components are malfunctioning.
Look for any system error messages or logs that could indicate the root cause.
Perform a reboot to clear temporary errors or resource exhaustion.
If the system continues to fail, investigate and fix any software or hardware issues.

questionnaire.question: Did the system log any errors leading to the failure?
Have hardware or software resources been fully allocated?

incident_solutions.description: A bug in an application preventing normal functionality.

resolution_steps.details: Try to reproduce the error in a testing environment to better understand the bug.
Identify any issues in the code that may be causing the malfunction.

resolution_steps.action: Fix the bug in the code.
resolution_steps.details: Correct the identified issue and test the fix thoroughly.
After successful testing, deploy the fix to the live environment.

questionnaire.question: Have the application logs indicated any specific error or bug?
Has the bug been reproduced in the testing environment?
